MilesWeb.com offers managed Windows VPS hosting plans with guaranteed uptime, 30 day money back and 24x7 round the clock support. All our VPS's are setup on Powerful Hexacore servers with limited number of accounts per node in order to deliver optimum performance on each container.

Windows VPS hosting plans and pricing details are mentioned below:

PERSONAL PLAN
  • Single Core
  • 1 GB RAM
  • 50 GB Disk Space
  • 50 GB Monthly Bandwidth
  • Windows 2008 OS
  • 1 IP Address Included
  • Full Remote Desktop Access
  • Windows Anti-Virus
  • Free Setup
  • 99.95% Uptime Guarantee
  • 30 Day Money Back
  • Monthly Price - Rs.3449 INR Per Month

PRO PLAN

  • 100 GB Monthly Bandwidth
  • Windows 2008 OS

  • Full Remote Desktop Access

GEEK PLAN

To order the above Windows VPS Hosting plans visit - Windows VPS Servers page.

We also offer Linux VPS hosting plans starting from Rs.1499 INR Per Month for more details please visit our website.

FAQs

How long does it take to setup?
All the VPS orders are verified manually, order verification process may take few hours after we receive the payment. Hence, the setup might take a few hours.

VPS Management?
We offer free management service with our VPS hosting plans. Support for third party applications is not provided.

Additional IPs?
We provide additional IPs if proper justification is given.

Payment Options?
We accept Paypal, Credit Card, Debit Card, Net Banking, Cheque and Bank Transfer payment.

Got questions? We've got answers! Contact MilesWeb.com today.
